issue.title: State of the Repo Report, April 2019
issue.body:
# State of the Repo Report, April 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â€“ enjoy! ðŸ¤“

The "median open pull request" adds 43 lines, removes 13 lines and touches 3 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 50 974 lines, removes 17 083 lines and touches 1 847 distinct files.

The repo contains 484 542 lines of text and 1 715 files.

There are currently 300 open pull requests from in total 86 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 6 percent.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, March 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15628)

## Suggested code changes waiting for review (grouped by author)
